overview: Works as a CMO of an internet high tech startup Gravity Research and Development that specialises in recommendation systems for IPTV and ebusiness firms. A tipical connector who has been working in advertising for 13 years at various agencies and agency types, mostly in digital (performance) marketing. Experienced with small and large account sales and management, strategic planning, training both on local and regional levels. Always took a leadership role managing small teams up to 15 people. Having an entrepeneur approach to agency business P/L responsibility or investor relations never made him worry.
